ygData.subject: Re: Polished Granite Tomahawk
ygData.msgSnippet: Sounds like sure death for a 10th level Paladin to solo a 22nd - 30th level Gnoll - Any Ideas on what level of group we re going to need to go after Mucktail?
ygData.messageBody:
Sounds like sure death for a 10th level Paladin to solo a 22nd - 30th level
Gnoll - Any Ideas on what level of group we're going to need to go after
Mucktail? I don't mind not getting experience or loot aside from the tomahawk
(well, maybe a little *grin*) but I don't want to assemble a group of six
10-14th level characters only to find that you need six 20th level characters
to stand a chance in living to get the tomahawk!

Any words of advice on what type of group will be required would be very much
appreciated! Thanks for all the information so far, it's proven to be very
helpful.

Kaladin

RangerDest@... wrote:

> I've seen tomahawks on sale for 250 pp at the cazik thule bazaar. They are
> off a 22ish gnoll named mucktail in highpass hold. He hits like he's 30
> though, so be careful.

--
